name: Helios
description: Helios is a source finder, it scrapes third-party sites (called providers) that are publicly available on the internet.
author: Davy

changeLogs.4.2.1:
Fix:
- provider could be deleted on automatic update if network issue
- share feature stop working
- File explorer: PM links inside directories weren't not showing
changeLogs.4.2.0: Search for infohash if magnet link not found (from PR #78 thanks to Minefield)
changeLogs.4.1.9: Fix HTTP issue preventing the use of fallback urls
changeLogs.4.1.7: Fix PM issue due to wako's sdk update
changeLogs.4.0.5: RD don't skip compressed files but display a warning about it
changeLogs.4.0.4:
Try to fix No links found error in RD.
Fix playlist issue
changeLogs.4.0.1: Use RD Player for browser action
changeLogs.3.9.9: File Explorer feature for PM & RD
changeLogs.3.9.5: Fix issue with playlist + Handle isPackage property returned by providers needed by orion
changeLogs.3.9.0: Fixes #57 - issue with RD matching for anime
changeLogs.3.8.1:
Cloud files handles RD - by @xTiCE
RD bug fixes
changeLogs.3.8.0: Do not cache PM stream links anymore due to their policy change
changeLogs.3.7.9:
- Bug fixes
- Improve resume action from playlist (will work for new playlists only).
- Update Greek translation thx to @aexarch
- Use the new wako's settings service. Warning wako now seems to backup your settings that use this service on its servers unless you disable this option in wako's settings, this means helios settings, providers URLs (not their content) and your debrid account credentials will be backup.
changeLogs.3.7.8: Add first version of cloud files view for PM - by @xTiCE
changeLogs.3.6.7: Allow to search for a video's title in another lang than english
changeLogs.3.6.3: Let me choose option will only display enabled actions
changeLogs.3.5.8: Search manually only when Enter key is pressed
changeLogs.3.5.7: Add trancoded option for chromecast in PM settings
changeLogs.3.5.4: Do not exclude already cached source if PM & RD are both used
changeLogs.3.4.4:
Add a more button on each source in sources list.
Apply same select files method for RD and PM
changeLogs.3.4.2: Fix share button in torrent tabs
changeLogs.3.2.7: Remove duplicated sources. Strip accent on manual search
changeLogs.3.2.5:
Add search from result input
Apply search filtering on manual search
changeLogs.3.1.3: Handle wako's built-in playlist. Use this playlist to play next episode on Elementum
changeLogs.3.1.2: Alert if episode not found on season pack
changeLogs.3.1.1: Add setting to enable/disable PM and RD on Streams tab
changeLogs.3.0.9: Add option to add cached source on your PM/RD account
changeLogs.3.0.1:
Scraping is faster than ever
You can now add more that one provider URL
When playing an episode Helios will try to queue the next one
View sources while scraping
Improved stats tab
changeLogs.2.1.9:
Add option to enable/disable automatic open remote
Ability to hide keyboard via enter key
Handle episodes-item-option action
changeLogs.2.1.8: Fix issue when trying to open video on browser
changeLogs.2.1.4:
Add option Let Me Choose as default action
Bug fixes
changeLogs.2.1.3: iOS: Add Play on nPlayer option
changeLogs.2.0.9: Select best source < 5gb if user has only a free PM account
changeLogs.2.0.8:
- Open source list if no sources found
- Don't test links on free Premiumize account to avoid burning free limit
changeLogs.2.0.4: For RD, opening on browser will open RD player on their website
changeLogs.2.0.3: Fix: Episodes not cached on RD but actually cached
changeLogs.2.0.1: Fix: quality filter wasn't applied on torrents
changeLogs.2.0.0:
- Lot of refactoring to simplify new updates.
- Big play button which will find the best source for you
- If you pick a source manually for an episode, Helios will try to find the equivalent source for the next episode (base on file name)
- The cup icon is the best source found By Helios. The one the Big play button will use
- Reorder/Toggle actions
- Add stats tab
changeLogs.1.1.1: Fix settings that couldn't be saved
changeLogs.1.0.9: Fix: Tab could not change in select source modal
changeLogs.1.0.8:
Fix RD auth issue when their server is down.
Add all files from season pack to RD.
RD fix issue with too many links
changeLogs.1.0.6: Fix issue with too many links which return no result
changeLogs.1.0.3:
Fix Elementum issue that doesn't open the stream.
Fix missing translations
changeLogs.1.0.1: PM - If query search (manual search), let the user pick the video
